metadata.description: Instant Crispy ButterMilk Vada | In just 10 mins | Quick and Easy Majjiga Garelu Recipe | How to make Wada. These Gaares are called Challa Gaare in Telugu. Challa is Buttermilk. There are many ways to make the Vadas. These are instant and can be made within just 10 minutes with Rice Flakes.

transcription_english: [00:00] Hello Foodies, Welcome to Vismai Food. Today's special is Instant Challa Garelu (Buttermilk Vada).
[00:05] Yes, these are much crispier and crunchier than regular Vadas and taste amazing.
[00:11] You can also offer these as Naivedyam. They get done very quickly. How quick? Just in 10 minutes.
[00:17] This is really true, they get done that fast and are very tasty. Let's start.
[00:21] First, take only two cups of thick poha.
[00:25] Pour three cups of water into it and let it soak for five minutes.
[00:30] After that, squeeze the water out tightly and put them in a mixing bowl.
[00:38] Now add one finely chopped green chili, salt, one teaspoon finely chopped ginger, quarter teaspoon asafoetida,
[00:46] Add three teaspoons of rice flour, two tablespoons of chopped coriander and mix well.
[00:51] The more you knead while squeezing the poha, the better the vadas will turn out without breaking.
[00:57] Now add a cup of sour curd to this.
[01:00] Add this and mix the dough well.
[01:03] If you mix this dough too hard, vadas will be hard; if too loose, vadas will break and absorb oil.
[01:09] So it should be semi-thick, remember to knead the poha well while mixing.
[01:15] Now add a teaspoon of cumin seeds and mix well,
[01:18] Wet your hands, shape them like vadas, make a hole in the center,
[01:23] Drop them in hot oil and fry only on medium flame.
[01:27] Do not use a ladle immediately after dropping them. Use the ladle after a minute.
[01:31] These take a little longer to fry than regular vadas, so fry patiently.
[01:37] Only then will they become crunchy and crispy. Staying crispy for a long time is the specialty of these vadas.
[01:42] Remember, the real taste comes only if you use sour curd.
[01:47] After they fry crispy, remove and keep them in a basket; they stay crispy longer, don't cover them.
[01:52] You can make these very easily instantly. They are very very tasty. Everyone will like them.
[01:58] So, did you like it? Then you try it and definitely post the pic of how it turned out for you on Vismai Food Instagram.
[02:04] By the way, don't forget to visit the vismaifood.com website.
